programme.title: Night Swim
programme.desc: Forced into early retirement by a degenerative illness, former baseball player Ray Waller moves into a new house with his wife and two children. He hopes that the backyard swimming pool will be fun for the kids and provide physical therapy for himself. However, a dark secret from the home's past soon unleashes a malevolent force that drags the family into the depths of inescapable terror. Writer/director Bryce McGuire's horror, starring Wyatt Russell and Kerry Condon Bryce McGuire - Director Wyatt Russell - Ray Waller Kerry Condon - Eve Waller Amélie Hoeferle - Izzy Waller Gavin Warren - Elliot Waller Nancy Lenehan - Kay.

programme.title: The Dry
programme.desc: Federal agent Aaron Falk returns to his drought-stricken home town after an absence of more than 20 years to attend the funeral of his childhood friend. But his arrival opens up a decades-old wound - the unsolved death of a teenage girl. Crime drama, starring Eric Bana and Genevieve O'Reilly Robert Connolly - Director Eric Bana - Aaron Falk Genevieve O'Reilly - Gretchen Schoner Keir O'Donnell - Greg Raco John Polson - Scott Whitlam Julia Blake - Barb Hadler.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview-April 2025
programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on Sky Cinema, plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Dangerous Waters
programme.desc: A sailing trip turns into a nightmare when a woman uncovers the dark past of her mother's new boyfriend. programme.title: Sumotherhood
programme.desc: Riko and best friend Kane bungle the robbery of a local bank, causing one of the customers, hard man Leo Demarco, to suffer a heart attack. Fake news spreads that Leo is dead and Shotti, leader of one of East London's toughest firms, recruits Riko and Kane in gratitude for killing a rival. programme.title: Superbad
programme.desc: Comedy starring Jonah Hill and Michael Cera as Seth and Evan, two boys bonded by their lack of popularity. programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop
programme.sub-title: Comedy, Drama, Action, Crime/detective, Family ║ 2009 ║ PG
programme.desc: Comedy starring Kevin James. Shopping-centre security guard Paul Blart has always dreamed of being a cop, but his hypoglycemia prevents him passing the physical. However, when crooks take over the shopping centre, Paul finds himself as the local police force's "man on the inside" Steve Carr - Director Kevin James - Paul Blart Jayma Mays - Amy Keir O'Donnell - Veck Sims Bobby Cannavale - Commander Kent Stephen Rannazzisi - Stuart Shirley Knight - Mom Raini Rodriguez - Maya Blart.

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop 2
programme.sub-title: Comedy, Drama, Action, Crime/detective, Family, Children's ║ 2015 ║ PG
programme.desc: The bumbling security guard is invited to attend a conference in Las Vegas, and brings his teenage daughter along for a family holiday before she leaves for college. However, he is forced to leap into action when he uncovers a gang of criminals are plotting a casino heist. programme.title: Wonder Woman
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Romance, Drama, Sci Fi, War ║ 2017 ║ 12
programme.desc: Fantasy action adventure starring Gal Gadot and Chris Pine. Young Diana has been raised a warrior on the secret island of Themyscira, shielded from the perils of the real world. programme.title: The Cinema List: British Sky Originals
programme.desc: Not sure what to watch next? Then discover some of the greatest British Sky Originals. From Four Kids and It to SAS Red Notice, there's something here for everyone.

programme.title: The Shamrock Spitfire

programme.title: Dune: Part Two
programme.sub-title: Action, Romance, Thriller, Drama, Sci Fi, Fantasy ║ 2023 ║ 12A
programme.desc: Epic sci-fi drama starring Timothée Chalamet and Zendaya. With the evil Harkonnen family back in charge of Arrakis, deposed heir Paul Atreides and his mother have taken refuge with the native Fremen in the planet's perilous desert wasteland. programme.sub-title: Romance, Drama, Music, Musical, Arts And Culture ║ 2018 ║ 15
programme.desc: Musical romantic drama starring Lady Gaga and Bradley Cooper. Rock star Jackson Maine meets aspiring songwriter Ally, a waitress who moonlights as a bar singer. programme.desc: Former Royal Navy officer Bernie Jordan is happily settled with wife Rene at a care home. In 1980s Washington, charismatic Texas politician Charles Wilson is notorious for his hard-drinking, drug-taking and womanising lifestyle, earning the nickname "Good Time Charlie". He is alarmed when Angela and her friend Katherine vanish in the woods and return three days later with no memory of their ordeal. A shocking chain of events convinces Victor that his daughter's soul is at stake and he calls upon Chris MacNeil to help him confront an ancient evil. programme.desc: Turtle brothers Donatello, Leonardo, Michelangelo and Raphael have been raised in the sewers of New York by their mentor Splinter. programme.desc: United Archives 29/10/94. The Reds took on Kevin Keegan's tabling-topping Newcastle looking for a revenge after the Magpies had dumped them out of the League Cup just 3 days earlier.

programme.title: PL: United v Newcastle 95/96
programme.desc: United Archives 27/12/95. United were 10 points behind Kevin Keegan's Newcastle at the top of the Premiership when the Magpies came to Old Trafford for this Christmas cracker.

programme.title: PL: Newcastle v United 95/96

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Berbatov
programme.desc: Sam Homewood, David May and Helen Evans travel to London to meet up with Cult United hero Dimitar Berbatov.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Kuszczak
programme.desc: The former United keeper opens up about the risks he took to get his dream move to Old Trafford, and what it was like working alongside Edwin van der Sar.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Rooney
programme.desc: United and England's record goalscorer looks back on his incredible years at Old Trafford; the trophies, the training sessions, the dressing room pranks - this episode has it all!

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Odion Ighalo
programme.desc: The Nigerian striker shares his incredible journey to Old Trafford. Odion also revealed how he used to save up his dinner money to pay to watch United play at weekends.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Danny Webber
programme.desc: Danny talks about his experience coming through the Manchester United Academy and the demands that Eric Harrison and Sir Alex Ferguson put on him at a young age.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Russell Beardsmore
programme.desc: We hear about Russell's pranks which (bravely) were usually at the expense of Sir Alex Ferguson. Watch to the end to find out what happened when he aimed a snowball at the boss.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Gary Bailey
programme.desc: The former United keeper dialled in to the Pod all the way from Miami Beach. He told us how he struggled to settle in to the dressing room at times and how it sometimes ended up in a fight.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Raimond
programme.desc: The former United keeper looks back on his time at Old Trafford and reveals the highs and lows of working alongside Peter Schmeichel.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Ji-Sung Park
programme.desc: Ji reflected fondly on his special years at United and his close relationship with the fans, but he requested them to stop singing his chant, which has offensive connotations to the people of Korea.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Luke Chadwick
programme.desc: Chaddy told us the hilarious reason for once missing a training session and the attempt at covering it up, which landed him in a web of lies with Sir Alex.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Schweinsteiger
programme.desc: Deutscher Fussballmeister spoke glowingly of United's interim manager, Ralf Rangnick, and midfielder Scott McTominay, whose talent stood out to Schweinsteiger when he was training with Reserves.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Stam - Part 1
programme.desc: The Pod team joined Jaap in his hometown of Zwolle in The Netherlands for an extended look through his playing and managerial career, where he revealed how he initially turned down Sir Alex Ferguson.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Stam - Part 2
programme.desc: Jaap talks us through his controversial exit from Manchester United, and reveals that there was an opportunity for him to return to Old Trafford in the seasons that followed.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Kieran Richardson
